comments.author: Kamil
comments.content: “So you can do Java, yeah? That’s kinda like C++, right? Here’s a position for senior C++ developer that fits you perfectly” i.e. "So you can do a woman job yeah? Its kindda like a man's job? Here is a position to be a construction worker that fits you perfectly." Excellent
